entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Morden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 a.m. CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 3 April 2023
